attributes.action: bestow a knighthood on Lennox Lewis (former three time world heavyweight boxing champion) in recognition of his services to boxing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lennox Lewis is a shining example to youngsters. He overcame obstacles to become boxing's world heavyweight champion on no less than 3 separate occasions. He is one of only three world heavyweight champions to have retired with no unavenged defeats.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
